sentences.en: Do not use a grainy mustard.
Grainy edge: Surface roughness on edges of web caused on the drying process.
sentences.cn: 起皱纸边: 纸卷边缘在干燥过程所引致的起皱情况.

sentences.en: Note: Images can become blurry when scaling up or grainy if they're scaled down too much.
sentences.cn: 注意: 图像可能会因为大幅度的缩放而变得起杂点或者含混.

sentences.en: Our product line contains platinum, grainy series.
sentences.cn: 我们产品线有金箔, 木纹,大理石系列.

sentences.en: Pear flesh is white and juicy, and grainy in texture.
sentences.cn: 梨肉雪白,多汁, 肉质呈颗粒状.

sentences.en: Rudy : Even so, the movies are usually pirated and they're so grainy.
sentences.cn: 虽然是这样, 那些电影也是盗版的啊,他们都是那么的粗糙.

sentences.en: That was before his political opponent grainy video of Allen to the YouTube Web site.
sentences.cn: 但这些都是发生在他的政治对手在YouTube网站 发布关于他的不清楚视频之前.

sentences.en: The film is shot in grainy black and white.
sentences.cn: 这部电影拍成有颗粒状的黑白片。

sentences.en: The palate has a silky start and a grainy, mineral - rich finish.
sentences.cn: 入口时立即感受丝般滑柔,最终有显见大地矿物气味结尾.

sentences.en: The photographs were grainy and indistinct.
This grainy video from the Greek Navy shows captured pirates in the Gulf of Aden.
sentences.cn: 这段希腊海军提供的不太清晰的视频显示在亚丁湾被抓捕的海盗.

words.tran_cn: 粮食；颗粒；[作物] 谷物；纹理
粒状；多粒；木纹状的；微粒状态
粒状的；木纹状的；多粒的；有纹理的

trans.tran_cn: 粒状的，有颗粒的，模糊不清的，粗糙的
trans.tran_en: A grainy photograph looks as if it is made up of lots of spots, which make the lines or shapes in it difficult to see
